name: Pioneer Demo 1
description:
Hello, I am a High School junior who made this project for my AP research project. I had been interested in game development for a long time before this. Although this game is quite bare bones at the moment, I plan to continue its development after finals this year. I would really appreciate it if you would take this (https://forms.gle/b2PTECPzN4WEmwz56) survey so that I can obtain research data. Email me at nightknight803@gmail.com with any inquires or if you would like to receive a copy of the search paper when I complete it. Thank you so much for helping me with my research.

Intro music by live mas (live mas - YouTube)
